overview: David Evans is an independent consultant focused on advising social networks and associated markets on growth strategies, social media and product development initiatives. As editor of OnlineDatingPost.com, David has covered the online dating industry since 2002. He has performed due diligence on social and dating properties and participated in fundraising and M&A activities for the institutional investing community. Areas of expertise include social networking, online dating, blogging, podcasting, community building, viral marketing and social media.
